109  inline ~plODBCDataDescriptor();

114  //=============================================================================
115  inline void set_data_type(unsigned int var)
116  {
117  if(is_label_[var]){
118  ODBC_->set_column_value_type<std::string> (var);
119  }
120  else {
121  ODBC_->set_column_value_type<plFloat> (var);
122  }
123  }
124 
125  //=============================================================================
126  inline plFloat get_data_value(unsigned int var)
127  {
128  if(is_label_[var]){
129  const std::string label = ODBC_->get_column_value<std::string> (var);
130  return label_[var].label_to_index(label);
131  }
132  else {
133  return ODBC_->get_column_value<plFloat> (var);
134  }
135  }
136 
137  //=============================================================================
138  inline bool get_data_record(const plValues* &data_values,
139  const std::vector<bool>*& data_definition)
140  {
141  if (ODBC_->next ()==0) { //no error in accessing datasource
142  for(unsigned int i= 0; i < current_row_.size(); ++i){
143  current_row_def_[i] = ODBC_->get_column_def(i);
144  if(current_row_def_[i])
145  current_row_[i] = get_data_value(i);
146  }
147  data_values = &current_row_;
148  data_definition = &current_row_def_;
149  return true;
150  }
151  else{
152  data_values = 0;
153  data_definition = 0;
154  return false;
155  }
156  }
157 
158  //=============================================================================
159  inline unsigned int get_num_fields()const
160  {
161  return num_fields_;
162  }
163 
164 
168  virtual unsigned int get_n_records()
169  {
170  if(!this->is_ok_) return 0;
171 
172  if(ODBC_){
173  return ODBC_->get_num_rows();
174  }
175 
176  return 0;
177  }
178 
179 
187  inline void set_variables(const plVariablesConjunction &variables)
188  {
189  assert(variables.dim() == get_num_fields() );
190  assert(!variables.is_empty());
191 
192  variables_ = variables;
193 
194  is_label_.assign(get_num_fields(), false);
195  label_.resize(get_num_fields());
196  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < get_num_fields(); ++i){
197  plSymbol s = variables_[i];
198  if( s.get_var_type() == PL_LABEL){
199  is_label_[i] = true;
200  label_[i] = plLabelType( s.get_type() );
201  }
202  }
203 
204  //data values binding
205  for(unsigned int i= 0; i < current_row_.size(); ++i){
206  set_data_type(i);
207  }
208 
209  }
210 
211  virtual plVariablesConjunction observed_variables()
212  {
213  if(variables_.is_empty())
214  throw plError(115);
215 
216  return variables_;
217  }
218 
219  plValues create_row_values() const
220  {
221  return (!variables_.is_empty() ?
222  plValues(variables_) :
223  plValues(plArray("X", plRealType(-std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max(), std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max()),
224  1, num_fields_)));
225  }
226 
227 protected:
228  plDatabaseInitError init();
229  void handle(plDatabaseInitError errorId);
230 
231  virtual void Output(std::ostream &os)const
232  {
233  os << "plODBCDataDescriptor: " << std::endl
234  << " Host: " << host_ << std::endl
235  << " User: " << user_ << std::endl
236  << " Query: '" << query_ << "'" << std::endl
237  << " Variables: " << variables_;
238  }
239 
240 
241 protected:
242  std::string host_;
243  std::string user_;
244  std::string passwd_;
245  std::string db_;
246  std::string query_;
247  std::string port_;
248  std::string driver_name_;
249 
250  plValues current_row_;
251  std::vector<bool> current_row_def_;
252 
253  bool connection_open_by_descriptor_;
254  unsigned int num_fields_;
255  plODBCDataConnector *ODBC_;
256  plVariablesConjunction variables_;
257  std::vector<bool> is_label_;
258  std::vector< plLabelType > label_;
259 };

264 inline plODBCDataDescriptor::plODBCDataDescriptor( const std::string &host, const std::string &user, const std::string &passwd,
265  const std::string &db, const std::string &query,
266  const std::string &port, const std::string &driver_name)
267  : plDataDescriptor()
268  , host_(host)
269  , user_(user)
270  , passwd_(passwd)
271  , db_(db)
272  , query_(query)
273  , port_(port)
274  , driver_name_(driver_name)
275  , current_row_()
276  , current_row_def_()
277  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(true)
278  , num_fields_(0)
279  , ODBC_(0)
280  , variables_()
281  , is_label_()
282  , label_()
283 {
284  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
285  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
286 
287  handle(errorId);
288 }

291 inline plODBCDataDescriptor::plODBCDataDescriptor(const plVariablesConjunction& variables,
292  const std::string &host, const std::string &user, const std::string &passwd,
293  const std::string &db, const std::string &query,
294  const std::string &port, const std::string &driver_name)
295  : plDataDescriptor()
296  , host_(host)
297  , user_(user)
298  , passwd_(passwd)
299  , db_(db)
300  , query_(query)
301  , port_(port)
302  , driver_name_(driver_name)
303  , current_row_()
304  , current_row_def_()
305  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(true)
306  , num_fields_(variables.dim())
307  , ODBC_(0)
308  , variables_()
309  , is_label_(num_fields_, false)
310  , label_(num_fields_)
311 {
312  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
313  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
314 
315  handle(errorId);
316  set_variables(variables);
317 }

347 inline plODBCDataDescriptor::plODBCDataDescriptor( const plVariablesConjunction& variables,
348  plODBCDataConnector *odbc, const std::string &query,
349  const std::string &port, const std::string &driver_name)
350  : plDataDescriptor()
351  , host_()
352  , user_()
353  , passwd_()
354  , db_()
355  , query_(query)
356  , port_(port)
357  , driver_name_(driver_name)
358  , current_row_()
359  , current_row_def_()
360  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(false)
361  , num_fields_(variables.dim())
362  , ODBC_(odbc)
363  , variables_()
364  , is_label_(num_fields_, false)
365  , label_(num_fields_)
366 {
367  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
368  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
369 
370  handle(errorId);
371  set_variables(variables);
372 }

374 
375 //===============================================================================================
376 inline plDatabaseInitError plODBCDataDescriptor::init()
377 {
378  if(connection_open_by_descriptor_){
379  ODBC_ = new plODBCDataConnector;
380 
381  ODBC_->set_driver(host_, user_, passwd_, db_,port_, driver_name_);
382  ODBC_->connect();
383  }
384 
385  if(!ODBC_->is_connected()) return PL_CONNECTION_ERROR;
386 
387  const bool query_ok = ODBC_->run_query(query_);
388  if(!query_ok) return PL_QUERY_ERROR;
389 
390 
391  const unsigned int nf = ODBC_->get_num_fields();
392  // no variables
393  if(num_fields_ == 0){
394  num_fields_ = nf;
395  }
396  else{
397  if(num_fields_ != nf) {
398  const std::string message = "The query results does not match the variables dimension";
399  throw plError(82, message);
400  }
401  }
402 
403  is_label_.assign(num_fields_, false);
404  label_.resize(num_fields_);
405 
406  current_row_= create_row_values(); //.resize(num_fields_);
407  current_row_def_.resize(num_fields_);
408 
409  //data values binding
410  for(unsigned int i= 0; i < current_row_.size(); ++i){
411  set_data_type(i);
412  }
413 
414  return PL_NO_ERROR;
415 }
416 
417 //===============================================================================================
418 inline plODBCDataDescriptor::~plODBCDataDescriptor()
419 {
420  if(connection_open_by_descriptor_){
421  // Deleting the connector will also disconnect it;
422  delete ODBC_;
423  }
424 }
425 
426 //===============================================================================================
427 inline void plODBCDataDescriptor::rewind()
428 {
429  ODBC_->first();
430 }
431 
432 //===============================================================================================
433 inline void plODBCDataDescriptor::handle( plDatabaseInitError errorId)
434 {
435  std::string message;
436 
437  switch(errorId){
438  case PL_INITIALIZATION_ERROR : message = "Could not initialize the ODBC driver";
439  break;
440  case PL_CONNECTION_ERROR : message = "Could not open connection to host '" + host_
441  + "' using database '" + db_ + "'";
442  break;
443  case PL_QUERY_ERROR : message = "Executing query '" + query_ + "' on host '" + host_
444  + "' and using database '" + db_ + "' fails";
445  break;
446  case PL_NO_ERROR : break;
447  }
448 
449  if(PL_NO_ERROR != errorId) throw plError(82, message);
450 }
